summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 discussing and congratulating the team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It highlights the significant effort required to build the case against her and mentions an upcoming press conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; her arrest is announced and congratulated. She is described as 'a woman very worthy of criminal prosecution.'

persons.name: AJN
persons.context: Mentioned in a forwarded email as someone whose opinion on the case is hoped for ('I hope AJN loves your case as much as everyone else does').

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested. The email congratulates the team on this accomplishment, noting the extraordinary work required to build the case based on old conduct.

events.title: Press Conference Announcement
events.description: A press conference regarding the Maxwell case was scheduled for 12 PM on the day of her arrest.

events.title: Team Call Discussing Case
events.description: A call was held on the Tuesday prior to the arrest where the case against Maxwell was discussed.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The case against Maxwell was described as not inevitable but the result of 'extraordinary amount of work and perseverance and creativity' by a team.
The criminal conduct forming the basis of the case is noted to be very old, potentially older than the team's paralegals.
A press conference regarding the arrest was scheduled for 12 PM on July 2, 2020.
